description:
None of the Team Kuu members have been pushovers, but none have been quite so vile and perverted as Fuko`s opponent, Fujimaru! Can Fuko keep her cool, and her shirt?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bakuretsu!! Otome no Hada no Himitsu!!
Explosion! The Secret of a Maiden`s Flower!!
爆裂!! 乙女の肌の秘密!!
